author: topix.com
title: Can towns near Japan's Fukushima nuclear plant recover? - Norwalk Citizen News
text:
There are 1 comment on the Norwalk Citizen News story from 14 hrs ago, titled Can towns near Japan's Fukushima nuclear plant recover? . In it, Norwalk Citizen News reports that:
In this Friday, Sept. 4, 2015 photo, the rusty train track of Joban line is covered with weeds near the Tatsuta Station in Naraha town, Fukushima prefecture, northeastern Japan.
Join the discussion below, or Read more at Norwalk Citizen News.
